Reference

All functions

add_coherence()

Add a column with 'coherence' information to a data.frame

app_run()

Run the Shiny Application

calc_distance()

Computes distance (3.1.19-3.1.21)

check_diff()

Check correctness of id_site_enq and date_enq between 2 data.frames

check_evavelo()

Check input file correctness (Eva-velo)

check_multiple_volume()

Check volume abnomaly in multiple questionnaires

check_num_outliers()

Search for outliers in numeric values

check_similar_enquete()

Detects similar response in enquete

check_warn_cities_cp()

Check a list of cities and try to find replacement values

correct_categ()

Analyze and correct categorie

correct_itinerant()

Apply categorie_corrige methodology when Itinerant is present in the answer

correct_spor_lois()

Apply categorie_corrigee Methodology to decide between Sportif and Loisir

correct_util_lois()

Apply categorie_corrigee Methodology to decide between Utilitaire and Loisir

correct_util_sport()

Apply categorie_corrigee Methodology to decide between Utilitaire and Sportif

find_wrong_cities()

Find cities that couldn't be geocoded by geocode_cities()

find_wrong_geocoding()

Find all cities that failed to geocode when using geocode_evavelo()

geocode_cities()

geocode a data.frame based on city names

geocode_cities_cp()

geocode a data.frame with french cities and postcode

geocode_city()

Geocode one city name

geocode_df_cities()

geocode df for cities

geocode_evavelo()

Geocode a eva_data object

geocode_row_by_row()

Geocode a data.frame of cities row by row

geocode_table_communes()

geocode table_communes cities

get_closest_point()

Get closest point b from points a

is_iti_coherent()

Helper function to control "coherence" of specific "itinerance" answers:

log_in_x_not_in_y()

Utils function to log date site combination that are in x and not in y

outliers_std_detect()

Standard detection of outliers

process_evavelo()

Read and process a eva-velo file

read_calendrier()

Read and clean "calendrier" information

read_comptage()

Read and clean "comptage" information

read_enquete()

Read and clean "enquete" information

read_evavelo()

Read and clean eva-velo xlsx file

read_table_communes()

Read and clean "table_communes" information

real_distance()

Compute real distance based on Indiggo formula

update_wb()

Update a workbook with data from R object

update_ws()

Update a specific worksheet from a workbook.
